entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or drizzle this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of wet snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon then periods of wet snow. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 4. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of wet snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of wet snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 10 September 2016
